Project_Title: Differential expression of circulating exosomal microRNAs in radioiodine refractory papillary thyroid carcinomas
Project_Description: Dedifferentiation of the PTC cell lines BCPAP and K1 was established by 131I pretreatment and verified by radioimmunoassay and Western blotting. Next-generation sequencing (NGS) was used to identify differentially expressed miRNAs in exosomes from radioiodine refractory and parental cell lines. Those related to the Na+/I- symporter (NIS) were selected and validated by quantitative real-time PCR (qRT-PCR) in PTC patients with non-131I-avid metastases and those with 131I-avid metastases.
